title: LOKI EPISODE 2 BREAKDOWN! Easter Eggs & Details You Missed!
author: New Rockstars
description:
Loki 1x02 shot-by-shot breakdown! Every Sacred Timeline target and Variant Loki explained! Thanks to BLUblox for sponsoring today's episode. Go to → https://thld.co/BLUblox_newrockstarsjune  and get up to 30% off on orders over $315 until June 30th!

Spoilers ahead!

Check out our sweet, sweet merch! http://www.newrockstarsmerch.com
Subscribe:​ ​http://bit.ly/SubNewRockstars​ | Enable ALL push notifications ​ 🔔
Watch the NEWEST videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4xEo4XxrSJbbjsGMSWDN62z8XB6QzHFy

Marvel's Loki Episode 2, "The Variant," reveals the variant Loki being pursued by the TVA is a female version of Loki, either Lady Loki or Enchantress! What is her true plan by bombing the Sacred Timeline, and what MCU Easter Eggs are hidden among the targets? Erik Voss breaks down this Loki episode scene by scene to explain all the hidden layers of meaning you might have missed, including Lady Loki's powers, and the past apocalyptic events in MCU history. What is Miss Minutes, exactly?

New Rockstars supports efforts to end racial violence. Please help those struggling, however you can: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ms_blm_homepage_2019

Hey everyone, welcome to the official New Rockstars YouTube channel! We cover what the internet cares about. From Marvel to the Walking Dead, Rick and Morty to Stranger Things, James Bond to Star Wars, and more. We got you covered in every movie and television show you might love! Don’t forget to subscribe and enable all push notifications so you never miss a review, breakdown, or theory.

最新のビデオを見る: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4xEo4XxrSJbbjsGMSWDN62z8XB6QzHFy

Marvel's Loki Episode 2 "The Variant "では、TVAに追われているバリアント・ロキが、レディ・ロキかエンチャントレスという女性版のロキであることが明らかに! セイクリッド・タイムラインを爆破した彼女の真の計画と、標的の中に隠されたMCUイースターエッグとは？エリック・ヴォスは、このロキのエピソードをシーンごとに分解し、レディ・ロキの力やMCUの歴史上の過去の終末的な出来事など、見逃しているかもしれない隠れた意味をすべて説明します。ミス・ミニッツとは一体何なのか？

localize.description:
洛基1x02逐个击破! 每一个神圣的时间轴目标和变体洛基都有解释! 感谢BLUblox对今天的节目的赞助。前往→https://thld.co/BLUblox_newrockstarsjune，在6月30日之前，订单超过315美元可获得30%的折扣!

前面有剧透!

看看我们可爱的、甜蜜的商品吧！http://www.newrockstarsmerch.com
订阅: http://bit.ly/SubNewRockstars | 启用所有推送通知 🔔
观看最新的视频: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4xEo4XxrSJbbjsGMSWDN62z8XB6QzHFy

漫威的《洛基》第二集 "变种"，揭示了被TVA追捕的变种洛基是一个女性版本的洛基，不是Lady Loki就是Enchantress! 她炸毁神圣时间线的真正计划是什么，目标中又隐藏着哪些MCU复活节彩蛋？埃里克-沃斯逐一分解了这一集洛基的场景，解释了你可能错过的所有隐藏的意义层，包括洛基夫人的力量，以及MCU历史上过去的世界末日事件。分钟小姐究竟是什么？

漫威的《洛基》第二集 "變種"，揭示了被TVA追捕的變種洛基是一個女性版本的洛基，不是Lady Loki就是Enchantress! 她炸燬神聖時間線的真正計劃是什麼，目標中又隱藏着哪些MCU復活節彩蛋？埃裏克-沃斯逐一分解了這一集洛基的場景，解釋了你可能錯過的所有隱藏的意義層，包括洛基夫人的力量，以及MCU歷史上過去的世界末日事件。分鐘小姐究竟是什麼？
